info.name: School Management API
info.description: APIs for adding and listing schools by proximity.

request.description:
Retrieves all schools from the database and sorts them based on the distance from the user's provided coordinates.

**Expected Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
[
    {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "Pimpri-Chinchwad International School",
        "address": "456 Auto Cluster, PCMC, Pune",
        "latitude": 18.6298,
        "longitude": 73.7997,
        "distance_km": 15.01358893952134
    },
    {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Global Innovators School",
        "address": "123 Tech Park, Bangalore, KA",
        "latitude": 12.9716,
        "longitude": 77.5946,
        "distance_km": 836.819077977456
    }
]
```
